long_description: . Author: Grahm Doe. Softcover; 320 pages; color photographs and maps. Wolverine Publishing; copyright 2013. Graphics superimposed on photographs help you navigate your way up the routes. Includes names, difficulty ratings and detailed route descriptions. .
short_description: Shuteye Ridge describes more than 800 routes in the climber's paradise of the bullet-hard and finely featured granite on the west side of California's Sierra Mountains.
